scripts.build:alpha: pnpm run docgen && rsbuild build --env-mode alpha
scripts.build:beta: pnpm run docgen && rsbuild build --env-mode beta
scripts.build:rc: pnpm run docgen && rsbuild build --env-mode rc
scripts.alpha: pnpm changeset pre enter alpha && pnpm changeset version && pnpm changeset pre exit
scripts.beta: pnpm changeset pre enter beta && pnpm changeset version && pnpm changeset pre exit
scripts.rc: pnpm changeset pre enter rc && pnpm changeset version && pnpm changeset pre exit
scripts.release: pnpm changeset tag && git push --follow-tags && pnpm publish
scripts.token: wis token -s w -o ./src/packages/themes/tokens --light ./src/assets/themes/theme.light.tokens.json --dark ./src/assets/themes/theme.dark.tokens.json --component ./src/assets/themes/component.basic.tokens.json --palette ./src/assets/themes/palette.tokens.json --gray black:./src/assets/themes/gray.black.tokens.json blue:./src/assets/themes/gray.blue.tokens.json -t blue:./src/assets/themes/brand.blue.tokens.json orange:./src/assets/themes/brand.orange.tokens.json && pnpm run format
